component.name: Atomic OS Manager
component.summary: Configure your atomic OS with image-specific options

description.p: Atomic OS Manager is an intelligent configuration tool that automatically detects your current atomic OS image and provides tailored configuration options specific to that image. It simplifies the process of switching between variants and managing image-specific features.

ul.li: Bazzite: Game Mode toggle, GPU selection (AMD/NVIDIA/Intel), branch selection
Bluefin/Aurora: Developer Experience (DX) mode, GPU selection, branch selection
Automatic detection of current image and configuration
Smart URL generation based on selected options
Single "Apply" button to execute all changes

screenshot.caption: Configuration options for your atomic OS

description.p: Major release - New image-specific configuration tool

ul.li: System update integration with reboot prompts
Smart DX mode visibility based on variant capabilities
Fixed Bazzite variant naming with registry validation
Enhanced UI with system maintenance at the top
Action buttons after successful system updates

description.p: Initial release of Atomic OS Manager
